header.title: Privacy Requests (RGPD/GDPR)
header.description: Use the options below to contact us by email with a pre-filled template. We may need to verify your identity before processing certain requests.

access.title: Data Access Request
access.description: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
bullets: Best if you include your order number
We may ask for identity verification

deletion.title: Data Deletion Request
deletion.description: Request deletion of your personal data (“Right to Erasure”).
bullets: Some records may be retained for legal/tax reasons

rectification.title: Rectify Data Request
rectification.description: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal information.
bullets: Tell us exactly what is wrong

unsubscribe.title: Unsubscribe Request
unsubscribe.description: Stop receiving marketing emails and promotional messages.
bullets: Use the email address you subscribed with
Transactional emails may still be sent

footer.title: Tips to speed up processing
bullets: Include the email used during checkout (and order number if available).
Be specific about what you want (what data, what correction, etc.).
For deletion requests, note that some transaction records may be retained for legal/tax compliance.

body.intro: I would like to submit a privacy request under applicable data protection laws.
body.emailUsed: Email used on the website (if different):
body.verifyNote: - I understand you may need to verify my identity before processing this request.
